Articles.Content:
For a while now I have wanted a bomber, so I made one after a while of brain storming ideas. What the result is was much more than I wanted. In fact it is truely worthy of my Air prefix, which is only reserved for the biggest and most epic planes. Although not very big, the 15th Air can out turn many fighters. She carries a payload of 8 medieum bombs, three .5 meter tank and two nose cones. In my mind this plane is so much an achievement to me she is my wallpaper. I will let the pictures say the rest.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Action Groups

1) First Bomb

2) Second Bomb

3) Third Bomb

4) Forth Bomb

5) Fifth Bomb

6) Sixth Bomb

7) Seventh Bomb

8) Eigth Bomb

9) Four Bombs at Once

0) The Other Four

I also have a cargo version where the vertical stabaliser is moved to the wings for roof attatchments. There is a Re-Fueler premade just for the Air-15 on the carrier. All you need to do is do a cargo drop where your empty Air-15 is.

Air-15 Download

https://www./folder/undefined/

Air-15 Carrier

https://www./folder/undefined/
i like the bombs and the bomb bay.... Now make one bigger

i like the bombs and the bomb bay.... Now make one bigger

Thanks, now I can't stop thinking about a bigger one. Guess my weekend is gone.

Suggestion for a roof-carrier version: move the main wings forward a tiny bit and make a H-Tail at the back.

Edited February 9, 2014 by Kyrian

Suggestion for a roof-carrier version: move the main wings forward a tiny bit and make a H-Tail at the back.

http://englishrussia.com/images/soviet_space_program_vm-t_atlant/1.jpg

Your image wont work, however an H would mess up the center of lift so the main wing is acting as the tail with a sorta H tail. Good idea though, I think I will use an H tail in the larger bomber.

Here is a sneek peak of Air-16, tell me what you think Kyrian and Brobel

Edited February 9, 2014 by Jeb Cubed
The mediafire links are broken. Is there another way I can download this?
Instead of having the central tail and the 2 outers, extend the 2 outer tails downwards. Tell me what you think of that

The mediafire links are broken. Is there another way I can download this?

Hope this works

Has three jets

Instead of having the central tail and the 2 outers, extend the 2 outer tails downwards. Tell me what you think of that

The final version has a proper H trail and a central tail, the downwards didnt have enough control for my likeing so there is the center tail. Thanks though
The google drive thing says I need permission from the owner to access it.
Permission granted. That won't work. I will try something else though. Any segestions?

Looks like there is an outbreak of download link issues today...
